name: Teslacoin
description: Elon Musk has already stated that Tesla will soon start accepting bitcoins as payment for its products. The head of the company announced on his Twitter page that Tesla electric cars can now be purchased for digital currency. Outside the United States, the possibility of paying with bitcoins will become available later this year. In the future, we plan to take this place away from Bitcoin. our goal is to make the tesla token successful in the world of cryptocurrencies like bitcoin ethereum
